channel.title: Causal Inference on Daman Dhaliwal
channel.description: Recent content in Causal Inference on Daman Dhaliwal

item.title: The Role of Social Capital in Business Performance: An Empirical Analysis
item.description: This paper examines how different dimensions of social capital—economic connectedness, social cohesion, and civic engagement—affect business survival and growth during economic crises.

item.title: Viral Voting: A study in the information diffusion effects of different social pressure treatments on voter turnout.
item.description: This paper studies the information diffusion effects of different social pressure treatments on voter turnout.
